primarySegments.name: Young Urban Professionals
primarySegments.description: Tech-savvy individuals living in urban areas who prioritize safety and quick communication in emergencies.

problemsNeeds: Need quick and reliable emergency communication
Concerned about personal safety in urban environments
Desire for peace of mind when traveling alone
behaviors: Regularly use mobile apps for convenience
Likely to test and adopt new technologies

primarySegments.name: Elderly Living Alone
primarySegments.description: Older individuals living independently who require reliable emergency communication tools.

problemsNeeds: Need for quick assistance in medical emergencies
Desire for a sense of security while living alone
Concern about being unable to reach help when needed
behaviors: Depend on family or caregivers for tech setup

primarySegments.name: Parents with Young Children
primarySegments.description: Parents who are concerned about the safety of their children and want a reliable way to ensure their well-being.

problemsNeeds: Need to ensure children's safety during emergencies
Desire for tools that provide peace of mind
Concern about quick access to help
behaviors: Use apps for family organization and safety
Engage with parenting and safety communities online
